quotes.quote: The way i need you is a loneliness i cannot bear.
Like mercy from heaven's gate, there's a freedom in your arms that carries me through. I need you.
Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you.' Mature love says 'I need you because I love you.'
I want you to need me like the air you breath,I want you to hold me in your loving arms, I want you to need me, like i need you!
Today and always, beyond tomorrow, i need you beside me, always as my friend, lover and forever soul mate.
I need you now, I need you tomorrow, I need you every single second. Please don't leave, unless you never cared...
I never use the word, it's loaded. What love means to me is need.
I need you. Right now. Let me love you right here, please.
You are the one I want, the one I need, the one I have.
I need you like the blues needs the pain.
You can't be gone. I need you here, with me. What am I going to do without you?
I found everything i needed when i found you.
You're everything I hope for. You're everything I need. You are so beautiful to me.
I love you because I know you're always there, there to catch me when I fall, there to listen when i need you, there when I feel alone.
For every day, I miss you. For every hour, i need you. For every minute, I feel you. For every second, I want you. Forever, I love you
Sometimes you don't even know what you want until you find out you can't have it
I need You like hurricane...to tear my walls down. I'm only yours now.
But if you tame me, then we shall need each other. To me, you will be unique in all the world. To you, I shall be unique in all the world.
I'm lying. I don't just need someone like you. I need you.
You can't always get what you want, but if you try sometimes, you might find, you get what you need.
I need you for a lot of things, Hardy. A lifetime's worth of things.
I do not need to love you to prove that I love myself!!
I need you to love me, I don't like me, either, if that helps.
I don't need words, I just need you to come back.
I need you to be happy. I need one of us to be happy.
I need you more than I need freedom.
I need him like the axe needs the turkey.
Your kind-of-woman needs a guy—not a fine gentleman.
Oh, you'll need me. You'll need a woman. Need what a woman can give you. To do what you have to do. The sun only shines half the time.
Will you still need me, will you still feed me, when I'm sixty-four?
Difficult or easy, pleasant or bitter, you are the same you: I cannot live with you—or without you.
Oh, we don't want to lose you but we think you ought to go / For your King and your Country both need you so.
When someone needs us, it makes us feel important and significant, so it's also natural to assume that needing someone is a sign pu our love for them.
We can only take responsibility for our own happiness when we don't rely on someone else to complete us.

When we need someone to give to us in a very specific manner, it's because there are needs that we need to fill; and these needs create gaps inside us that heavily influence our definition of what love is.
If you depend on someone for your happiness, you are becoming a slave, you are becoming dependent, you are creating a bondage.
The more you depend on forces outside yourself, the more you are dominated by them.
Lord my sovereign God, creator of the universe have mercy on my soul for I am one of many who need you.
I need your love and strength to shape my life, teach me how to be like your son, to have the heart, the virtue, the fire of Jesus Christ.
When you need someone, you will lose your independence as a human being. You are constantly reliant on another person
When your not around / I feel lost and not centered / Then I find my way home / And I'm breathing again / Safe and comforted.

To have the warm scent of your breath waking me in / the middle of the night. I need you closer. / Standing by my side. My heart longs for you. / So distant you feel to me, you're like that star, shining so far...
My lovely one, be near to me tonight. / For now, I need you most, since I have gone / Through the sparse woodland in the fading light, / Where in time past we two have walked alone.

What have you more than I, who crave you so? / Have I, not hands and feet and thoughts to tell? / All my sweet senses and fine dreams that swell / Rich with contentments that the star-winds blow? / Yet do I need you everywhere I go.
Come close, lemme know you. / Inside me, I need you to be true. / All time me, gonna stay true, / inside you.

Woman I need you (I need you) like never before (Like never before) / African woman you're the one I adore / I need you (I need you) like never before (Like never before) / And when you're with me I feel so safe and secure.
Oh baby, I need you / For the rest of my life, girl / I need you / To make everything right, girl / I love you / And I'll never deny that / I need you.
I need you like the flower needs the rain / You know I need you, guess I'll start it all again / You know I need you like the winter needs the spring / You know I need you, I need you.
Your soul sings to mine. My soul is yours, and it always will be, in any world. No matter what happens. I need you to remember that I love you.
I need you to protect me from being lonely. Don't fight for me. Be with me. That's what I need.-Bianca to Lucas
I need you to know that no matter what happens, it was worth it to me. Being with you, loving you. It was all worth it.
I do not need drugs to be a genius, do not take a genius to be human, but I need your smile to be happy.
I need you to pray for me; I need you to care for me. I need you to want me to win. I need to know where I'm heading because I know where I've been.

I love the time I spend with you. You make my living worthwhile. Why don't I meet you before. I wish I could start my life From the beginning with you because the time I spend with you is never enough. I need you more every day.
I need you here with me we look for our love but we don't find it. I'm searching and searching, I really need you here with me boy, we're going Round-and Round!
They say our love is not true but the truth is that they're all fools,  I need you, you need me that's the end of our love story.
